introContent:
Covid Act Now is an independent 501(c)(3) nonprofit founded by volunteers in March 2020. 

We help people make informed decisions by providing timely and accurate data about COVID in every U.S. state, 380+ metros, 3,100+ counties, and two U.S. territories. We are committed to:

* **Data**: We support data- and science-backed policies and decision-making
* **Transparency**: Our data and methodologies are fully open-source so that the public can vet, freely use, and build upon our work
* **Accessibility**: We make data universally accessible so that anyone can easily understand and use it, regardless of ability or prior knowledge

Please note that we are not a government or healthcare organization. We do not provide testing, vaccination, or other on-the-ground COVID services.

impactContent:
Covid Act Now is the COVID-focused initiative of the Act Now Coalition. Our COVID data and risk assessment includes every U.S. State, 380+ metros, 3,100+ counties, and two U.S. territories.

We have served over **12m website users** since the beginning of the pandemic, and keep almost **200k subscribers** up to date on COVID news and developments through our daily newsletter.

We've worked with more than 100 federal, state, and county officials as well as numerous multinational corporations and NGOs to develop data-driven COVID responses.

futureProjectsContent:
### Act Now Coalition and Rewiring America

Act Now Coalition is proud to announce our next project: a partnership with the non-profit Rewiring America to build best-in-class data models that support the electrification of U.S. households at all income levels, and modernize America’s energy infrastructure. 


We believe that it is possible to solve the climate crisis in our lifetime and that America has a responsibility in this endeavor to both lead and inspire. America pioneered the collection of energy generation and consumption data. Fresh analysis indicates that electrification and the subsequent decarbonization of our energy grid will slow climate change while saving millions of American households thousands of dollars a year. It will create millions of new, local jobs and restore American economic leadership. 2020 is the decade to decarbonize.


We are very excited about this next venture and the opportunity it provides to apply data- and science-backed decision-making, as well as open-source, accessible tools to the critical initiative of electrification.


As ever, we remain committed to our work on COVID, to maintaining our data, and to helping people navigate the pandemic as it continues to evolve.
